title: The mindes melodie Contayning certayne psalmes of the kinglie prophete Dauid, applyed to a nevv pleasant tune, verie comfortable to euerie one that is rightlie acquainted therewith.
author: Montgomerie, Alexander, 1545?-1598.
publisher: Printed be Robert Charteris, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,
notes: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio regali.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
